com.neovisionaries.jdo

Class JdoDao<TEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neovisionaries.jdo.JdoDao<TEntity>
  • Type Parameters:
    TEntity - 

    public class JdoDao<TEntity>
extends Object
    DAO based on JDO. 
     // Set up a shared persistence manager factory.
 JdoDao.setupSharedPersistenceManagerFactory("transactions-optional");

 // Create a DAO with an entity class.
 JdoDao<Customer> dao = new JdoDao<Customer>(Customer.class);

 // Use the DAO.
 Customer customer = dao.getById(customerId);

    • Method Detail

      • getSharedPersistenceManagerFactory

        public static javax.jdo.PersistenceManagerFactory getSharedPersistenceManagerFactory()
        Get the persistence manager factory that has been set by setSharedPersistenceManagerFactory(PersistenceManagerFactory).
        Returns:
        The shared persistence manager factory.

      • setSharedPersistenceManagerFactory

        public static void setSharedPersistenceManagerFactory(javax.jdo.PersistenceManagerFactory factory)
        Set a persistence manager factory that is shared as fail-safe for JdoDao instances which do not have a persistence manager factory of their own.
        Parameters:
        factory - A persistence manager factory.

      • setupSharedPersistenceManagerFactory

        public static void setupSharedPersistenceManagerFactory(String name)
        Set up a shared persistence manager factor. This method calls JDOHelper.getPersistenceManagerFactory(name) and sets the returned value as the shared persistence manager factory. 
         JdoDao.setupSharedPersistenceManagerFactory("transactions-optional");
        Parameters:
        name -

      • getPersistenceManagerFactory

        public javax.jdo.PersistenceManagerFactory getPersistenceManagerFactory()
        Get the persistence manager factory for this instance.
        Returns:
        The persistence manager factory that has been set via JdoDao#JdoDao(PersistenceManagerFactory) or setPersistenceManagerFactory(PersistenceManagerFactory).

      • setPersistenceManagerFactory

        public JdoDao<TEntity> setPersistenceManagerFactory(javax.jdo.PersistenceManagerFactory factory)
        Set a persistence manager factory for this instance.
        Parameters:
        factory - A persistence manager factory to set.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • getPersistenceManager

        public javax.jdo.PersistenceManager getPersistenceManager()
        Get a persistence manager, which is obtained from the persistence manager factory which is set to this JdoDao instance, or from the shared persistence manager factory when no persistence manager factory is set to this instance.
        Returns:
        A persistence manager, or null if no persistence manager factory is set.

      • delete

        public void delete(TEntity entity)
        Delete an entity. This method calls PersistenceManager.deletePersistent(Object).
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to delete.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - entity is null.
        IllegalStateException - Persistent Manager is not available.

      • deleteById

        public void deleteById(Object id)
        Delete an entity. This method calls PersistenceManager.getObjectById(Class, Object) to find the entity and then calls PersistenceManager.deletePersistent(Object) to delete the entity.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the entity.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - id is null.
        IllegalStateException - Persistent Manager is not available.

      • getById

        public TEntity getById(Object id)
        Get an entity. This method calls PersistenceManager.getObjectById(Class, Object).
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the entity.
        Returns:
        The entity, or null if not found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - id is null.
        IllegalStateException - Persistent Manager is not available.

      • put

        public void put(TEntity entity)
        Make an entity persistent. This method calls PersistenceManager.makePersistent(Object).
        Parameters:
        entity - An entity to be persistent.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - entity is null.
        IllegalStateException - Persistent Manager is not available.
        javax.jdo.JDOUserException
